title: A2: Exploratory Data Analysis
description: In this project I conduct a general analysis of MBTA transit as it relates to transit-oriented development in Massachussets, with a specific focus on accessibility.

title: A3: Visualization Critique & Redesign
description: In this project, I conduct critical design analysis a visualization from the New York Times, sketch my own version and present a final redesign based on my critiques.

title: A4: Perceptive or Deceptive Visualization
description: In this assignment, I utilize the principles of visualization design to manipulate a singular dataset and create a 1 perceptive and 1 deceptive visualization

title: Catch Me If You Can't
description: As a final deliverable for my research at the MIT Sloan School of Business I created a visual essay detailing my research on the accuracy of generative AI content detectors.

title: Wellesley Hackathon Development
description: As a member of the Web Development Team of the organizing committee was to help develop a site where students could gain vital information for all things WHACK.

title: Cash Course
description: As our entry into the Wellesley Hackathon 2025, my team made a AI powered financial literacy platform targeted towards first-gen and low income students.
